description_for_human: Turn your ideas into engaging social media posts. 70+ proven frameworks for LinkedIn, X, Telegram, Instagram & YouTube.
description_for_model: Make Content is an AI-powered web application that transforms user ideas into ready-to-publish social media posts. Key features: 1) 70+ proven content frameworks (structured templates like '5 Harsh Truths', 'The Day That Changed Everything', 'What Clients Actually Want') organized in 11 categories. 2) Multi-platform output: one input generates optimized posts for LinkedIn, X/Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, and YouTube. 3) Full customization: users set their industry, role, target audience, preferred tone (Professional, Rant, Empathic, Analytical, Storyteller), and post goal (Engagement, Newsletter, Consultation, Event, Authority). 4) Generation history saved for future reference. Built for founders, consultants, marketers, coaches, and anyone building a personal brand through content.
